name: ProvoTowneCentre
0:
”Alexa, ask Provo Towne Centre what restaurants they have”
”Alexa, ask Provo Towne Centre what time do they open”
”Alexa, ask Provo Towne Centre whats the phone number”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: provo towne centre
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Provo Towne Centre’s skill will let you know all the important information and happenings at the center. Whether you’re curious what type of stores they have, where to get a rideshare, when they will be closing, or what the next upcoming event is, download this skill to be informed on all things at Provo Towne Centre. You can access this skill on any of your Alexa devices.

To get started, enable Liberty Center’s skill through the Alexa App or by saying, “Alexa, open Provo Towne Centre.”

If you’re having trouble, please visit www.provotownecentre.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
